title: Gather and Document Requirements for CloudBridge Integration
description: Collaborate with relevant teams (Networking, Security, Operations) to collect, document, and understand the technical requirements for integrating on-premises infrastructure with cloud networking infrastructure. This includes: a) Understanding the existing on-premises network topology; b) Identifying security requirements, compliance regulations, and desired cloud networking architecture; c) Gathering stakeholder requirements and constraints through interviews or workshops. The output will be a comprehensive document detailing the technical requirements for the CloudBridge project. Additionally, consider providing an initial outline of the document to facilitate its organization and ensure all necessary sections are covered.

title: Design Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture for the CloudBridge solution, including transit gateways, site-to-site VPN, and direct connections.

title: Implement Transit Gateway
description: Set up and configure transit gateways for connecting on-premises and cloud networks.

title: Implement Site-to-Site VPN
description: Establish site-to-site VPN connections between on-premises and cloud networks.

title: Implement Direct Connect
description: Set up direct connections between on-premises and cloud networks for high-speed, low-latency data transfer.

title: Security Audit
description: Perform a security audit on the CloudBridge solution to ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices.

title: Testing and Validation
description: Test and validate the CloudBridge solution to ensure it meets the requirements and functions as expected.

title: Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the CloudBridge solution, including architecture diagrams, configuration guides, and user manuals.

title: Deployment and Monitoring
description: Deploy the CloudBridge solution to production environments and set up monitoring and alerting systems.
